# Extract years
year_pattern = re.compile(r'\b(19\d{2}|20\d{2})\b')

results = []
for ref_id, text in refs:
    years = year_pattern.findall(text)
    if years:
        years_int = [int(y) for y in years]
        min_year = min(years_int)
        results.append((min_year, ref_id, text))

results.sort()
for year, ref_id, text in results[:15]:
    print(f"Year: {year}, ID: {ref_id}")
    print(f"  Text: {text[:150]}")
    print()
